laboratory_examinations.findings: Initially elevated lipase at 6759, later decreased to 550.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Elevated lipase levels decreased from 6759 to 550 with significant symptom relief.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Reveal multiple small filling defects in the lower third of the CBD; three small stones were removed. Mild irregularity at the origin of the pancreatic duct.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Comparison is made with prior MRCP, but no specific previous findings outlined for comparison.
